snippet.title: Tattoo Removal Simulator - Announcement Trailer
snippet.description:
Wishlist Tattoo Removal Simulator on Steam 👉 https://bit.ly/steam_TRS9

In Tattoo Removal Simulator, you’ll step into the shoes of a skilled tattoo removal specialist. Your mission? To help clients turn a new page by erasing colorful tattoos that hold deep personal stories—from love and heartbreak to secrets and regrets.

The game blends a calming, therapeutic gameplay experience with narrative depth, allowing you to uncover the unique tales behind each tattoo while mastering the tools of the trade.

Today, we’re excited to reveal our very first gameplay trailer! Although the trailer showcases a very early version of the game with just few female characters 🙈 (more are in the works!), we’re thrilled to share it with you and can’t wait to hear your thoughts and see how the community responds! 😄

Until next ink-worthy updates! May your laser stay steady and your clients leave spotless!😄

#tattoogame  #satisfyinggames  #simulationgame  #indiegames  #gamingvideos
